function buyOrder(address tokenTarget, uint256 priceUSD) external payable returns (int256)
function sellOrder(address tokenTarget, uint256 priceUSD, uint256 amount) external returns (int256)
function cancelOrder(uint256 orderId) external payable returns (uint256)
function viewMyOrders() external view returns (tuple(uint8 odt, address tokenIn, address tokenOut, uint256 amountIn, uint256 priceUSD, address user, bool executed)[])
function orders(uint256) external view returns (uint8 odt, address tokenIn, address tokenOut, uint256 amountIn, uint256 priceUSD, address user, bool executed)
event OrderCreated(uint256 indexed orderId, address indexed user, uint8 odt, address tokenIn, address tokenOut, uint256 amountIn, uint256 priceUSD)
event OrderCancelled(uint256 indexed orderId, address indexed user, address token, uint256 amount)
event OrderExecuted(uint256 indexed orderId, address indexed user, uint8 odt, uint256 amountIn, uint256 amountOut)
